about_the_game:
Hop between candles, matches and other fuels in this tile based puzzle game; where the goal is simple: light all candles before your flame flickers out.

Deduce and discover the rules and mechanics on your own. Fundamental levels break down mechanics into their core concepts. Intuitive UI and visual cues help you draw the right conclusions.

Hints are progressive, you control how much of the solution is revealed.

FEATURES:

  • 30+ levels with unique mechanics and interactions

  • Progressive hint system

  • Intuitive point and click controls

  • Multiple solutions
detailed_description:
Hop between candles, matches and other fuels in this tile based puzzle game; where the goal is simple: light all candles before your flame flickers out.

Deduce and discover the rules and mechanics on your own. Fundamental levels break down mechanics into their core concepts. Intuitive UI and visual cues help you draw the right conclusions.

Hints are progressive, you control how much of the solution is revealed.

FEATURES:

  • 30+ levels with unique mechanics and interactions

  • Progressive hint system

  • Intuitive point and click controls

  • Multiple solutions

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Flicker Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz, 32-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz, 64-bit
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Hop between candles, matches and other fuels in this tile based puzzle game; where the goal is simple: light all candles before your flame flickers out. Deduce and discover the rules and mechanics, then put your understanding to the test as the difficulty ramps up.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
